titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I received the Holy Communion at 8 a.m.: and attended Mattins. I finished the C.T. sermon; walked with Cruickshank: had a conference with representatives of the University about arrangements to guard against Fire, & with the Mayor about allotments.
